message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $135?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
I'm willing to make another concession, Bob. How about we meet at $130?
I'm getting close, but I think I can do a bit better. Would you consider $127?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. How about we meet at $129?
I'm really close, but I think I can do a bit better. Would you consider $126?
I'm getting a bit tired of negotiating, Bob. How about we meet at $128?
I'm not willing to go any higher than $125. That's my final offer.
